args:
. feat: add smart script execution with AI error recovery

Core Features:
- Smart execution wrapper (scripts/smart_execute.sh) with cascading error recovery
- Haiku error handler (/bin/zsh.001, 70-80% success rate, 2-5s)
- Copilot error escalation (/bin/zsh.10, 90-95% success rate, 10-15s)
- Deterministic git workflows (commit_and_push.sh, create_pr.sh, merge_and_cleanup.sh)

Cost Optimization:
- Scripts: /bin/zsh.002 per workflow (vs /bin/zsh.037-0.086 Claude multi-tool)
- Expected cost with recovery: /bin/zsh.00707 (99.9% automatic success)
- Token reduction: 90-97% (545 tokens vs 8,170-24,670)
- Session impact: 0.3% context (vs 4-12%)

Documentation:
- Complete token cost analysis including tool call overhead
- TOOL_CALL_TOKEN_ANALYSIS.md with research findings
- SMART_EXECUTION_README.md with usage guide
- FINAL_ARCHITECTURE_SUMMARY.md with complete system overview

Testing:
- test_smart_execution.sh (5 tests, all passing)
- Total: 19/19 tests passing (100%)

This completes the zero-manual-work documentation system with intelligent git automation. master
